Backpack_Description: An extremely rigid backpack, made of sturdy leather layered over a reinforced metal cage.
Backpack_Effect_Tooltip:
The load may feel lighter on your back, but your legs cannot be fooled: fatigue looms in at every step.

<color=orange>-50%</color> weight to items in backpack
<color=orange>-1%</color> movespeed per <color=orange>10kg</color> in backpack
